name: VSH Solutions
tag_list: vshsolutions, vsh-solutions, ria, rich-internet-application, firefox, chrome, safari, ie, internet-explorer, opera, node-js, mongodb, thunderbird
overview:
VSH Solutions is dedicated to the Rich Internet Application [RIA] development. Our mission is to provide people with the means to turn their dreams into reality with help of all the tools we got in our toolbox. VSH Solutions is a laboratory where science and creativity meet to develop, research and explorer new ideas. Collectively we explore design directions, develop ideas and turn them into nice shiny products.

Today VSH Solutions taking leading positions on the browsers and email client plug-ins market. Big experience in this area helps to deliver best solutions in tide timeframes. Our company makes an effort to share the knowledge it’s obtained through the years.
